description_zh: 疏浚工程设计流程（标准查表+GIS计算）。输入：船型、吨位、航道长度、土质。
description_en: Professional dredging design flow using standard lookups and GIS calculation. Requires: ship_type, tonnage, channel_length, soil_type.

steps.description_zh: 根据船型和吨位从标准表中查询所需的航道深度和宽度。
steps.description_en: Find required channel depth and width from standard tables based on ship type and tonnage.

steps.description_zh: 基于标准尺度和地形数据，使用 GIS 引擎计算疏浚工程量。
steps.description_en: Calculate dredging volume using GIS engine based on standard dimensions and terrain data.

steps.description_zh: 根据土质类型查询推荐的施工设备及其产能。
steps.description_en: Find recommended equipment and productivity based on soil type.

steps.description_zh: 将所有计算和查询结果汇总成一份专业的设计报告。
steps.description_en: Synthesize results into a professional report.

inputs.title: Professional Dredging Design Report (${ship_type} - ${tonnage}t)
